movie.title: The Disaster Artist
movie.description_intro: Aspiring actor Greg Sestero befriends the eccentric Tommy Wiseau. The two travel to L.A, and when Hollywood rejects them, Tommy decides to write, direct, produce and star in their own movie. That movie is The Room, which has attained cult status as the "Citizen Kane" of bad movies.
movie.description_full: Aspiring actor Greg Sestero befriends the eccentric Tommy Wiseau. The two travel to L.A, and when Hollywood rejects them, Tommy decides to write, direct, produce and star in their own movie. That movie is The Room, which has attained cult status as the "Citizen Kane" of bad movies.

movies.title: Winter's Child
movies.summary: A man leaves his pregnant wife because he does not want to be a father, then he begins a relationship with another woman who loves someone else.
movies.description_full: A man leaves his pregnant wife because he does not want to be a father, then he begins a relationship with another woman who loves someone else.
movies.synopsis: A man leaves his pregnant wife because he does not want to be a father, then he begins a relationship with another woman who loves someone else.

movies.title: A Good Man
movies.summary: After an illustrious special ops career ends in disaster, Alexander (Seagal) goes off the grid and attempts to lead a quiet life as a handyman at an apartment complex in Romania. But when one of his tenants and her family fall under the thumb of a local gangster, Alexander is dragged into an all-out war between rival Chinese and Russian gangs; forcing him to not only defend the family, but bringing him face to face with an old foe, and giving him one more chance to reconcile his past.

movies.title: Pothole Wars
movies.summary: Potholes are driving Britain mad. They cause rage, rows and road works, costing billions of pounds to repair, and are responsible for injuring hundreds of people each year. The road network is being pushed to the max and for the workers on the frontline, it can be like going into battle. Some councils say they're at financial breaking point, struggling to cope with the pothole problem while 'pothole vigilantes' are taking matters into their own hands.

movies.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
movies.summary: After King Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick go on a quest in 6 days to retrieve his crown. On the way SpongeBob and Patrick defeat many evildoers using their brains and bronzes. While this is happening someone is taking over Bikini Bottom and SpongeBob and Patrick must defeat this mastermind.
